headline: Eversource Energy: Deep Discount Comes With Risks
summary: Eversource is shifting back to a pure-play regulated utility, divesting non-core assets, and investing in grid modernization. See why ES stock is a Hold.

raw.headline: Eversource Energy: Deep Discount Comes With Risks
raw.summary: Eversource is shifting back to a pure-play regulated utility, divesting non-core assets, and investing in grid modernization. See why ES stock is a Hold.

headline: Eversource Energy: Newly Minted Dividend Aristocrat
summary: Eversource Energy offers a near-5% yield and has a 25-year track record of steady dividend growth. Read why I think ES stock is a buy.
